name: Superior_Attuned_Superior_Assassins_Mark_F
display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Assassins Mark F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Gives most of the Stalker's damaging attacks a 5% chance to recharge Build Up and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Stalkers and can be slotted into nearly all Stalker damage powers.
power_display_names: Superior Assassin's Mark: Recharge/Chance to Recharge Build Up (Stalker)
power_short_helps: Increases Attack Rate and Chance to Recharge Build Up
